title: Waza Ari– Kiwami-chan
original_name: わざアリっ ♡ きわみちゃん
sinopse:
Kiwami is a young girl who steadfastly refuses to think of herself as anything but the equal of any boy. She sees herself as the "World's Most Powerful Girl," and, as a result, has all the girls around her seeing themselves that way too.

(Source: Okazu)
